SEARCH
Package Model.DAO

Class ProductDAO

java.lang.Object
Model.DAO.ProductDAO
public class ProductDAO extends Object
The ProductDAO (Data Access Object) class is responsible for handling all database operations related to products. This includes saving, updating, inserting, deleting products, and managing product expiry information.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save(Product p)
      Saves a product to the database. If the product code exists, it updates the product's quantity and price, otherwise, it inserts a new product.
      Parameters:
      p - The product to be saved.

    • productCodeExists

      public boolean productCodeExists(String productCode)
      Checks if a product code exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      productCode - The product code to check.
      Returns:
      True if the product code exists, false otherwise.

    • updateProductQuantityAndPrice

      public void updateProductQuantityAndPrice(Product p)
      Updates the quantity and price of an existing product in the database.
      Parameters:
      p - The product with updated information.

    • insertProduct

      public void insertProduct(Product p)
      Inserts a new product into the database.
      Parameters:
      p - The new product to be inserted.
